column1: Welcome to Demo Store. To log in when visiting our site just click &lt
column23: at the top of every page, and then enter your e-mail address and password.&lt

column3: When you log in to your account, you will be able to do the following:&lt
Proceed through checkout faster when making a purchase&lt
Make changes to your account information&lt
Store alternative addresses (for shipping to multiple family members and friends!)&lt
If you have any questions about your account or any other matter, please feel free to contact us at &lt
